original_title: Kakss Vinyl Half Coating Kettle Bell for Gym & Workout (Size: (2KG, 4KG, 6KG, 8 KG, 10KG, 12KG, 14 KG, 16 KG, 18 KG, 20 KG, 24 KG, 28 KG, 32 KG, 36 KG, 40 KG) (20 KG (Black)) (Proudly Made in India)
optimized_title: KAKSS Cast Iron Kettlebell 20kg Black, Solid Vinyl Coated Kettle Bell Weights with Wide Textured Handle and Flat Bottom, Gym Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Strength Training Workout

image_analysis.product_name: Kakss Vinyl Half Coating Kettle Bell for Gym & Workout
image_analysis.material: solid cast iron with vinyl coating and black paint finish
key_features: Material: cast iron full solid vinyl coated
Top-quality solid cast iron material constructed with no welds, weak spots, or seams
Black paint finish to help prevent corrosion, increase durability, and improve grip
Covered with soft durable vinyl material to protect the floor and provide anti-corrosion
Wide textured handle for a comfortable and secure grip
Weight markings printed on the kettlebell
Inner core pure iron casting for high strength and long service life
Lead free coating with REACH compliance
Give your body a total toning and strengthening workout
Supports exercises such as front squats, swings, walking lunges, two-arm rows
Supports exercises such as two handed kettlebell swing, clean and press, squat, high pull, lunge, snatch
image_analysis.usage: Strength and conditioning workouts using kettlebell exercises at the gym or home, including swings, squats, lunges, presses, rows and similar movements.
image_analysis.target_audience: People doing gym or home workouts who want strength, toning and conditioning equipment, including fitness enthusiasts and athletes.
image_analysis.ai_description: A solid cast-iron kettlebell with a glossy black body and textured grey handle, clearly marked “KAKSS 20 KG” on the front. Other images show green and blue vinyl-coated versions, flat bottoms, wide handles, and infographics highlighting non-toxic, smell-proof coating and exercise examples.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Solid one-piece cast iron with vinyl coat won’t crack or loosen over time
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap kettlebells use welded heads that rattle, loosen or snap after drops

comparison_points.our_benefit: Wide textured handle and black paint finish give a secure, non-slip grip
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-cost bells have narrow, slick handles that hurt hands and slip when sweaty

comparison_points.our_benefit: Flat bottom and clear 20kg marking make storage and exercise setup simple
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Budget options wobble on the floor and have faint or peeling weight labels

comparison_points.our_benefit: Lead-free, non-toxic, smell-proof vinyl protects floors and wipes clean easily
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheaper bells arrive with strong chemical odors and coatings that scuff floors
